posts.title: About Me
posts.body: I am a current student at Calvin University studying Computer Science with a minor in German Studies. I love to program and learn about the inner workings of systems, and am interested in working in information security or development when I graduate.

posts.title: Experience
posts.body: I currently work at Calvin's Hekman Library and Calvin Information Technology. I am interested in internship opportunities in the field of Computer Science.

posts.title: Projects
posts.body: This is a short list of a couple of my projects: (These and others can be found on my github)

list.text: This website, written in React and styled with Tailwind Css
Dark mode everywhere, a chrome extension for making non dark mode websites darker
ESP2866 LCD writer, a micropython firmware for a custom cicuit board I built and had printed
